## Description {#details}

This file provides an implementation of debug counters.

Debug counters are a tool that let you narrow down a miscompilation to a specific thing happening.

To give a use case: Imagine you have a file, very large, and you are trying to understand the minimal transformation that breaks it. Bugpoint and bisection is often helpful here in narrowing it down to a specific pass, but it&#39;s still a very large file, and a very complicated pass to try to debug. That is where debug counting steps in. You can instrument the pass with a debug counter before it does a certain thing, and depending on the counts, it will either execute that thing or not. The debug counter itself consists of a list of chunks (inclusive numeric ranges). <code>shouldExecute</code> returns true iff the list is empty or the current count is in one of the chunks.

Note that a counter set to a negative number will always execute. For a concrete example, during predicateinfo creation, the renaming pass replaces each use with a renamed use.

If I use DEBUG&#95;COUNTER to create a counter called &quot;predicateinfo&quot;, and variable name RenameCounter, and then instrument this renaming with a debug counter, like so:

if (!DebugCounter::shouldExecute(RenameCounter) &lt;continue or return or whatever not executing looks like&gt;

Now I can, from the command line, make it rename or not rename certain uses by setting the chunk list. So for example bin/opt -debug-counter=predicateinfo=47 will skip renaming the first 47 uses, then rename one, then skip the rest.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Force-enables counting all DebugCounters.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since DebugCounters are incompatible with threading (not only do they not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// make sense, but we&#39;ll also see data races), this should only be used in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// contexts where we&#39;re certain we won&#39;t spawn threads.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#aa02d659d768b5a98297800f6f73d816c"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#aa02d659d768b5a98297800f6f73d816c">enableAllCounters</a>() &#123; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#ac4330a5f1dff21ba1f4be59381832358">instance</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a7e16c989dc10f4b275ef398fbceb5837">Enabled</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a69784654584ad4bff747432cac8c4f88"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a69784654584ad4bff747432cac8c4f88">isCountingEnabled</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compile to nothing when debugging is off</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifdef NDEBUG</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#ac4330a5f1dff21ba1f4be59381832358">instance</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a7e16c989dc10f4b275ef398fbceb5837">Enabled</a> || <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#ac4330a5f1dff21ba1f4be59381832358">instance</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a9070d3561a7e94cb9ac92e9f6fa76783">ShouldPrintCounter</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a6254547abf5f544643098984650605ce"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a90ec8b395d535fd1335f0604cc18967c">CounterVector</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a6254547abf5f544643098984650605ce">RegisteredCounters</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Whether we should do DebugCounting at all. DebugCounters aren&#39;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// thread-safe, so this should always be false in multithreaded scenarios.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a7e16c989dc10f4b275ef398fbceb5837"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a7e16c989dc10f4b275ef398fbceb5837">Enabled</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
